department: Departments of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Purchase of furniture under the SA for categories 1, 2, 5 and 6
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Public Safety Canada, has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Montreal, Quebec between November and December 2024. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number: WS4451675136
#### Publication Date: February 28, 2024

**Tender for Office Furniture Acquisition**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness (PS) is issuing a tender for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Montreal, Quebec between November 2024 and December 2024.

**Scope of Work:**

* Accommodation furniture
* Freestanding tables
* Stool seating
* Desking systems
* Worksurfaces

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Tender Method:**
This tender will be awarded based on open bidding, The bid submission deadline is March 28, 2024 at 14:00:00 EST. The solicitation is available for download on https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18934152?extsite=MTg5MzQxNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Québec K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18934152?extsite=MTg5MzQxNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I kept the core information (solicitation number, publication date, tender closing date, etc), however highlighted relevant information. I reformatted the text according to the space available, included all relevant information. I was not able to retain all original details.  Let me know if I can be of any more assistance.  There was so much information that was not needed (like trade agreements, etc), however I included all the contract details.
